    • Method Detail

      • maxSpanTree

        public static Graph maxSpanTree(Graph g)
        Get the maximum spanning tree.
        This function is specialized for Regular Vines. For that purpose, it uses absolute Edge weights to calculate the maximum spanning tree.
        The result is a spanning tree, which represents the most correlating variable pairs for the RVine.
        It uses the idea of Prim's MST algorithm, but searching for the maximum spanning tree instead of the minimum spanning tree.
        Parameters:
        g - a connected Graph.
        Returns:
        returns the maximum spanning tree of g.

      • kendallsTau

        public static double kendallsTau(double[] a,
                                 double[] b)
        Calculates the empirical Kendall's tau.
        Both random variables need to be rank normalized to get a reliable Kendall's tau value.
        Parameters:
        a - a rank normalized random variable.
        b - another rank normalized random variable.
        Returns:
        returns the empirical Kendall's tau for a and b.

      • goodnessOfFit

        public static Copula goodnessOfFit(Copula[] copulae,
                                   double[] a,
                                   double[] b)
        This is a placeholder for a goodness of fit test.
        It test the copulae for fitting between a and b. The best copula will be returned with its parameters.
        Because the RVine is currently using only Gauss copulae, this method returns the MLE on the Gauss copula function.
        Parameters:
        copulae - an array of copula families, that shall participate on the GOF-Test.
        a - an observation array.
        b - another observation array.
        Returns:
        returns the copula with its parameters that fits best.

      • estimateParameter

        public static Copula estimateParameter(Copula c,
                                       double[] a,
                                       double[] b)
        This is a MLE function.
        It optimizes the copula parameter.
        Because the RVine is currently using only Gauss copulae, this method is only applicable for those.
        Parameters:
        c - a copula, whose parameters are to be optimized.
        a - an observation array.
        b - another observation array.
        Returns:
        returns the copula with its optimized parameters.

      • logLikelihood

        public static double logLikelihood(Copula c,
                                   double[] a,
                                   double[] b)
        Log-Likelihood calculation for copulae.
        It is used to calculate the copula log-likelihood for the MLE.
        Parameters:
        c - a copula, whose log-likelihood is calculated.
        a - an observation array.
        b - another observation array.
        Returns:
        returns the log-likelihood.

      • rankNormalization

        public static double[] rankNormalization(double[] data)
        Get rank normalized data.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to be rank normalized.
        Returns:
        the rank normalized data.

      • createConditionedSet

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> createConditionedSet(Node a,
                                                                          Node b)
        Creates the conditioned set from two Nodes.
        See the constraint set definitions presented in J.F. Dißmann's diploma thesis.
        Parameters:
        a - a Node.
        b - another Node.
        Returns:
        conditioned set created by both nodes.

      • laplaceCorrection

        public static double laplaceCorrection(double x)
        Correction function.
        Corrects the value of x.
        It is used for infinity value handling.
        Parameters:
        x - the value to be corrected.
        Returns:
        returns the correction of x.
